lead_paragraph: DUBE--Alexander J. (1948-2016). The Board of Directors, Staff and Friends of the National Museum of Dance were deeply saddened to hear of the passing of Alexander Dube on May 19, 2016. Alex was a kind, generous, creative and larger-than life character, giving his life to the dance world, through his tireless work and fundraising for Career Transition for Dancers. His constant support of the National Museum of Dance and Hall of Fame was not only sincerely appreciated, but instrumental in many of the institution's successes and achievements. His passion for dance, dancers and the arts was clear, and was at the heart of everything he did. The National Museum of Dance and Hall of Fame sends its sincere condolences to all those touched by the life of Alexander Dube. May he live on in the wonderful memories so many shared with him. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DUBE, ALEXANDER J
